<div class="panel panel-default">
<div class="area-title">
<span>
题目描述
<small>Description</small>
</span></div>
<div class="panel-body">

<p><span>　　甲乙两人去射箭，采用轮流制(甲乙甲乙……)，谁先射中谁获得胜利，已知甲的命中率为</span><img src="/source/codevs/codevs-2943/img/aHR0cDovL2xhdGV4LmNvZGVjb2dzLmNvbS9naWYubGF0ZXg_XGZyYWN7QX17Qn0=.latex"><span>，乙的命中率为</span><img src="/source/codevs/codevs-2943/img/aHR0cDovL2xhdGV4LmNvZGVjb2dzLmNvbS9naWYubGF0ZXg_XGZyYWN7Q317RH0=.latex"><span>，求乙获得胜利的概率。</span></p>

</div>
</div>

<div class="panel panel-default">
<div class="area-title">
<span>
输入描述
<small>Input Description</small>
</span></div>
<div class="panel-body">
<p><span>　　共一行，四个用空格隔开的正整数</span><img src="/source/codevs/codevs-2943/img/aHR0cDovL2xhdGV4LmNvZGVjb2dzLmNvbS9naWYubGF0ZXg_QSxCLEMsRA==.latex"><span>。保证</span><img src="/source/codevs/codevs-2943/img/aHR0cDovL2xhdGV4LmNvZGVjb2dzLmNvbS9naWYubGF0ZXg_MCUzQyZhbXA7c3BhY2U7XGZyYWN7QX17Qn0mYW1wO3NwYWNlOyUzQyZhbXA7c3BhY2U7MSwwJTNDJmFtcDtzcGFjZTtcZnJhY3tDfXtEfSZhbXA7c3BhY2U7JTNDJmFtcDtzcGFjZTsx.latex"><span>。</span></p>

</div>
</div>
<div  class="panel panel-default">
<div class="area-title">
<span>
输出描述
<small>Output Description</small>
</span></div>
<div class="panel-body">

<p><span>　　共一行，一个小数，表示乙的胜率，</span><strong>四舍五入强制保留1000位小数</strong><span>。</span></p>

</div>
</div>


<div class="panel panel-default">
<div class="area-title">
<span>
样例输入
<small>Sample Input</small>
</span></div>
<div class="panel-body">
<pre>1 2 7 23

</pre>

</div>
</div>

<div class="panel panel-default">
<div class="area-title">
<span>
样例输出
<small>Sample Output</small>
</span></div>
<div class="panel-body">
<pre>0.

</pre>

</div>
</div>

<div class="panel panel-default">
<div class="area-title">
<span>
数据范围及提示
<small>Data Size & Hint</small>
</span></div>
<div class="panel-body">
<p><span>　　对于100%的数据：</span><img src="/source/codevs/codevs-2943/img/aHR0cDovL2xhdGV4LmNvZGVjb2dzLmNvbS9naWYubGF0ZXg_QSxCLEMsRFxpbiZhbXA7c3BhY2U7XGxlZnQmYW1wO3NwYWNlOygmYW1wO3NwYWNlOzAsMTBeezUwMH0mYW1wO3NwYWNlO1xyaWdodCZhbXA7c3BhY2U7KQ==.latex"></p>
</div>
